mainObjective: Investigate the mysterious disappearances in Harrow's Hollow and discover the fate of Scout Elen.

plotPoints.title: Shadows Over Harrow's Hollow
plotPoints.description: The party arrives in Harrow's Hollow, a small, anxious village gripped by fear. Elder Mirna Harrow asks the characters to investigate recent disappearances, including that of Scout Elen. Tensions run high as rumors of curses, spirits, and the haunted Keep of Doom swirl among the villagers. Players must gather information, win trust, and follow leads to piece together the mystery.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Norn has completed the ancient ritual at the Lost Ward Circle, successfully renewing the ward and weakening the keep's curse. The immediate supernatural threat to Harrow's Hollow is abated, and the next stage of the adventure can begin.

sideQuests.title: Superstition and Shadows
sideQuests.description: Old Tommen believes a wandering spirit haunts the village. If the party investigates, they may encounter the Wandering Shade—a restless ghost whose cryptic words offer hints about the keep and the missing villagers.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Communicating with the spirit yields crucial information or warnings.

sideQuests.title: Trouble at the Hearth
sideQuests.description: Cira the Innkeeper's cellar is plagued by minor poltergeist activity. Calming the spirit earns Cira's gratitude and a helpful clue about Scout Elen's last known movements.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Norn has revealed the true nature of the tunnels beneath the inn to Cira, warning her to keep the cellar sealed. The investigation into Elen's disappearance and the supernatural threat under Harrow's Hollow advances, closing the cellar mystery and setting the stage for the journey to the keep.

plotPoints.title: The Road to Doom
plotPoints.description: Tracking clues and rumors, the party must brave the haunted forest and reach the Keep of Doom. Along the way, they navigate treacherous terrain, spectral ambushes, and lingering wards. The forest is alive with unnatural energies, and the party may encounter allies or enemies who help or hinder their journey.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Norn has reached the Keeper's Cottage, initiating a key meeting with Keeper Morvath and advancing the quest to unravel the keep's curse.

sideQuests.title: The Lost Ward Circle
sideQuests.description: An ancient protective ward circle in the forest has failed. Restoring it could weaken the keep's influence and protect the village from spectral incursions.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Norn has successfully restored the Lost Ward Circle, creating a temporary protective barrier that weakens the undead and reveals a clearer path to the keep.

sideQuests.title: The Keeper's Warning
sideQuests.description: A mysterious hermit known as the Keeper dwells near the forest edge. They possess knowledge about the keep's curse but require assistance or convincing to share it.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Scout Elen stabilized with herbs and vital clues gathered for the restoration of ward circles. The party is prepared to consult the Keeper regarding the ritual and the curse's undoing.

plotPoints.title: Breach the Keep
plotPoints.description: The party reaches the foreboding Keep of Doom. They must find a way inside, dealing with traps, lingering magical defenses, and spectral guardians. Entry requires cunning, bravery, or the right key—perhaps obtained from earlier encounters.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Successfully entering the keep allows exploration of its haunted halls. The party gains access to deeper mysteries and faces the true source of the village's troubles.

sideQuests.title: The Black Banner Mercenaries
sideQuests.description: A band of mercenaries camps near the keep, seeking treasure. They may be allies, rivals, or obstacles depending on party interactions.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Handling the mercenaries wisely could provide reinforcements or at least prevent them from interfering.

plotPoints.title: The Heart of Darkness
plotPoints.description: Within the keep's depths lies the source of the curse: the vengeful spirit of Lord Thaddeus Greymont, corrupted by dark magic. The party must confront him, either by combat, exorcism, or fulfilling his final wish to find peace.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Defeating or pacifying Lord Greymont lifts the curse from the keep and surrounding lands. The village is saved, and any surviving captives (including Scout Elen if not already rescued) are freed.

plotPoints.title: Resolution and Rewards
plotPoints.description: With the curse lifted, the party returns to Harrow's Hollow as heroes. Elder Mirna and the villagers celebrate their success. Rewards, both material and social, await. New opportunities and adventures may present themselves as the party's reputation spreads.
plotPoints.plotImpact: The campaign concludes with the party's triumph. Seeds for future adventures may be planted based on discoveries made in the keep.

worldEvents.title: The Ward's Renewal
worldEvents.description: Norn successfully restored the Lost Ward Circle, creating a protective barrier against spectral threats.
effects: Undead in G001 have disadvantage on attacks for 24 hours
A clearer path to the keep is revealed
The village gains temporary protection from spectral incursions
